meanings.definition: peasants or agricultural workers in the Middle East
meanings.sent1: The fellaheen worked hard in the fields to grow crops.
meanings.sent2: The fellaheen lived in small villages near the fertile land.
meanings.sent3: The fellaheen joked about their bountiful harvest this year.
meanings.sent4: The fellaheen were the backbone of the agricultural community.
meanings.sent5: The fellaheen toiled under the scorching sun from dawn till dusk.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the fellaheen
meanings.sent1: The traditional dance showcased fellaheen culture.
meanings.sent2: The fellaheen attire was simple yet practical.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant served a fellaheen-inspired dish with a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork depicted the beauty of fellaheen life in vivid colors.
meanings.sent5: The music festival celebrated the rich fellaheen heritage.

meanings.definition: a member of the fellaheen class
meanings.sent1: She was proud to be a fellaheen and carry on the traditions.
meanings.sent2: The fellaheen gathered for a community meeting to discuss farming techniques.
meanings.sent3: The fellaheen children played happily in the fields after school.
meanings.sent4: He respected the wisdom of the elder fellaheen in the village.
meanings.sent5: The young fellaheen dreamed of a better future for their families.
